sentences.en: A + leaders outperform average ones on productivity, turnover, and employee commitment.
sentences.cn: 在生产力 、 营业额与员工投入方面,A+领导人比普通领导人表现更好.

sentences.en: And states that outperform the rest will be rewarded with a grant.
sentences.cn: 在各方面超过别人的州将获得资金奖励.

sentences.en: As advanced animals, human always outperform themselves in the sense.
sentences.cn: 人总是这样,作为高级动物, 在这方面总是超前表现.

sentences.en: European shares also outperform Wall Street.
sentences.cn: 欧洲股票的表现将优于华尔街.

sentences.en: For technical reasons , these babies outperform live - action video on the Web.
sentences.cn: 由于技术原因,它们比网上实况录像的效果还要好.

sentences.en: In fact, like many home - schooled pupils who outperform other children, Kurlowich need not have worried.
sentences.cn: 其实, 像很多比一般孩子出色的在家受教育的同学一样,库洛维奇用不着担心.

sentences.en: Innovative firms also tend to outperform their peers.
sentences.cn: 创新企业也往往会创造出超过它们年龄的成就.

sentences.en: Our 684 can surely outperform those Unit 124 bastards.
sentences.cn: 我们684部队绝对会超过124部队那些混蛋.

sentences.en: Quantum computers can theoretically outperform today's digital computers for more applications than previously thought.
sentences.cn: 和以前所想的比起来,理论上量子电脑的性能在更多的应用上超过现在的数字电脑.

sentences.en: Recent UnIt'su Liang sorting outperform the overall performance, short - term concern.
sentences.cn: 近期该股缩量整理,整体表现强于大盘, 短线 关注.

sentences.en: So we're looking for ways to outperform our competitors.
sentences.cn: 布什:所以,我们正在想办法超过我们的对手.
股票总体上要优于其他投资。

sentences.en: This theory also showed that stocks would outperform in the long run.
sentences.cn: 这一理论也表明,股票市场的长期表现将会胜出.

sentences.en: We seek to outperform our competition fairly and honestly.
sentences.cn: 我们致力于公平诚实地展开竞争.

sentences.en: When might individuals, acting independently, outperform teams in an organization?
sentences.cn: 组织中什么时候个人单独行动, 能比团队合作取得更好结果?

sentences.en: While hardware balancers may outperform software - based balancers, their flexibility is always limited.
sentences.cn: 虽然硬件平衡器可能超越软件基础的平衡器, 但它们的灵活性总是被限制.

trans.tran_en: to be more successful than someone or something else
